posts.title: Starting My AI Journey
posts.excerpt: After several years as a Wireless Account AE, I've decided to seriously pursue AI alongside my work supporting AIPC.
posts.content:
After several years as a Wireless Account AE, I've decided to seriously pursue AI alongside my work supporting AIPC. As AI becomes increasingly capable of doing everything, I believe it's more important than ever to document our own original thoughts and ideas.

This site will serve as a place to record my personal reflections and insights. I want to capture the human perspective and creativity that makes us unique, especially as AI continues to evolve.

My goals for this blog:
- Document my learning journey with AI
- Share insights from working with AIPC
- Record original thoughts and ideas
- Build a personal knowledge base

posts.title: Understanding AIPC Architecture
posts.excerpt: Today I explored the architecture of AI PCs and how NPUs are changing computing.
posts.content:
AI PCs represent a fundamental shift in personal computing. With dedicated Neural Processing Units (NPUs), these machines can run AI models locally without relying on cloud services.

Key advantages I've discovered:
- Privacy: Data stays on your device
- Speed: No network latency
- Cost: No cloud API fees
- Reliability: Works offline

The integration of NPUs alongside traditional CPUs and GPUs creates a heterogeneous computing environment that's optimized for different types of workloads. This is fascinating from both technical and practical perspectives.

posts.title: Claude and GitHub Pages
posts.excerpt: Built this site with Claude's help and learned about static site generation.
posts.content:
Today I successfully deployed my personal site on GitHub Pages with Claude's assistance. The process taught me several valuable lessons about static site generation and modern web development.

What impressed me:
- Claude generated a complete, responsive website
- The deployment process was straightforward
- GitHub Pages provides free, reliable hosting
- Version control makes updates easy

This experience reinforced my belief that AI tools are most powerful when they augment human creativity rather than replace it. I provided the vision and requirements, Claude provided the implementation, and together we created something useful.
